verbs.description: sf fines [V: airbnb] [ARG0: landlords] 2 25 million for illegal rentals airbnb crime does n’t pay that the message san francisco wants to send after collecting 2 25 million in a legal settlement from a well - heeled couple who turned 14 city apartments into illegal hotels through the vacation - rental service darren and valerie lee agreed to pay the money as penalties and investigation costs in addition they are barred for at least seven years from offering short - term rentals in any of the 17 san francisco buildings they own or manage the couple had to pledge their real estate as collateral to make sure they comply with the settlement which was approved in san francisco superior court on monday superior court carolyn reporter ai attorney dennis herrera california john c brown iii san francisco panhandle costco lees homeaway leavenworth darren the chronicle airbnb 2 25 million valerie lee john c brown iii
